recipes.name: Thai Basil Tofu Stir Fry
recipes.instructions: Sauté tofu until golden. Add garlic, chili, and bell peppers. Stir in soy sauce, sugar, and Thai basil. Cook for 2 more minutes and serve hot with rice.
recipes.author: Admin User

recipes.name: Kung Pao Shrimp
recipes.instructions: Marinate shrimp with soy sauce. Stir-fry garlic, ginger, and chili. Add shrimp, bell peppers, peanuts, and sauce. Cook until shrimp turns pink. Serve with rice.
recipes.author: Regular User

recipes.name: Mexican Chicken
recipes.instructions: Season chicken with spices. Grill or pan-fry until cooked through. Simmer in tomato sauce with onions and bell peppers. Serve with rice or tortillas.
recipes.author: Admin User

recipes.name: Egg White Bites
recipes.instructions: Whisk egg whites with chopped veggies. Pour into muffin tin. Bake at 375°F (190°C) for 10–12 minutes until set. Cool and serve.
recipes.author: Regular User

recipes.name: Greek Faro Salad
recipes.instructions: Cook farro. Mix with cucumbers, tomatoes, olives, and onions. Toss in olive oil, lemon juice, and herbs. Chill before serving.
recipes.author: Admin User

recipes.name: Mediterranean Diet Snack
recipes.instructions: Arrange olives, feta, hummus, and fresh veggies on a plate. Add gluten-free crackers or cucumber slices for dipping. Serve cold.
recipes.author: Regular User

recipes.name: Muffins
recipes.instructions: Mix flour, sugar, baking powder, eggs, milk, and butter. Fold in berries or chocolate chips. Pour into muffin tins. Bake at 375°F (190°C) for 20–25 minutes.
recipes.author: Admin User

recipes.name: Chocolate Cupcake
recipes.instructions: Whisk flour, cocoa powder, sugar, eggs, and oil. Fill cupcake liners halfway. Bake at 350°F (175°C) for 18–20 minutes. Cool and frost as desired.
recipes.author: Regular User

recipes.name: Whole Grain Bread
recipes.instructions: Combine gluten-free flour, yeast, salt, and water. Let dough rise for 1 hour. Shape and bake at 400°F (200°C) for 30–35 minutes. Cool before slicing.
recipes.author: Admin User

comments.author: Regular User
comments.content: This stir fry is so flavorful! Loved the Thai basil.

comments.author: Admin User
comments.content: Glad you enjoyed it! Try adding extra chili for more heat.

comments.author: Admin User
comments.content: Great shrimp dish, thanks for sharing!
